TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create and process a Facility without HostilityStatusCode in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates a Facility without HostilityStatusCode. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the Facility message schema area, for instance Ground Picture > Infrastructure and Environment. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created Facility (without HostilityStatusCode) is interpreted and displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates an Facility without a HostilityStatusCode.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Facility correctly.
